long_description: The Nathan QuickView Handheld Water bottle features a see-through touchscreen pocket perfect for operating your iPhone 4, 4S or 5. QuickView Handheld includes a 22 fl. oz. bottle with sport top. Zippered front pocket features a see-through conductive touchscreen so you can easily operate your iPhone. Internal, separate elastic pocket keeps money and snacks organized. Earbuds port lets you listen to tunes. BPA-free bottle is dishwasher safe (top rack).
short_description: The Nathan QuickView Handheld Water bottle features a see-through touchscreen pocket perfect for operating your iPhone 4, 4S or 5.
